data.trans: (+ to) Đến thăm nơi nào ở gần
data.trans_hint: Các bức thư của tôi đều đã bị trả lại, vì vậy tôi quyết định ghé thăm nhà cô ấy.
data.en_hint: My letters were all returned to me, so I decided to go around to her house in person.
data.content_game_1: My letters were all returned to me, so I decided to go around to her house in person.
data.answer_en_hint: My letters were all returned to me, so I decided to go around to her house in person.

data.trans_hint: Chúc cả hai luôn gặp nhiều may mắn và hạnh phúc sẽ càng tăng thêm khi năm tháng trôi qua.
data.en_hint: I wish you both the best of luck and, ever-increasing happiness as the years go by.
data.content_game_1: I wish you both the best of luck and, ever-increasing happiness as the years go by.
data.answer_en_hint: I wish you both the best of luck and, ever-increasing happiness as the years go by.

data.trans: Truyền đi, lan truyền, truyền khắp
data.trans_hint: Cuối cùng, một tin đồn bắt đầu lan truyền rằng tôi đã ngoại tình với chồng của một người bạn của tôi.
data.en_hint: Eventually a rumour began to go round that I was having an affair with one of my friends' husband.
data.content_game_1: Eventually a rumour began to go round that I was having an affair with one of my friends' husband.
data.answer_en_hint: Eventually a rumour began to go round that I was having an affair with one of my friends' husband.

data.trans_hint: Cô ta rút lại lời nói và không đề xuất cho tôi công việc đó nữa.
data.en_hint: She went back on her word and didn't offer me that job anymore.
data.content_game_1: She went back on her word and didn't offer me that job anymore.
data.answer_en_hint: She went back on her word and didn't offer me that job anymore.

data.trans_hint: Nếu kế hoạch của chúng ta thất bại, chúng ta có thể nghĩ đến phương án B.
data.en_hint: If our plan went down, we could think about plan B.
data.content_game_1: If our plan went down, we could think about plan B.
data.answer_en_hint: If our plan went down, we could think about plan B.

data.trans_hint: Giờ tôi sẽ đi vào chi tiết những việc cần làm để tăng doanh số bán hàng cho công ty chúng ta trong tháng này.
data.en_hint: Now I will go into details about what to so to ramp up sales for our company this month.
data.content_game_1: Now I will go into details about what to so to ramp up sales for our company this month.
data.answer_en_hint: Now I will go into details about what to so to ramp up sales for our company this month.

data.trans_hint: Chúng mình đã ôn lại bài vở để chuẩn bị tốt nhất cho kì thi.
data.en_hint: We went over our lessons so that we could be best prepared for our exams.
data.content_game_1: We went over our lessons so that we could be best prepared for our exams.
data.answer_en_hint: We went over our lessons so that we could be best prepared for our exams.

data.trans_hint: Tớ nghĩ chúng ta cứ loanh quanh mãi chưa xong vì mớ ý tưởng vẫn còn đang rối bời.
data.en_hint: I think we have gone round in circles when our ideas are still jumbled.
data.content_game_1: I think we have gone round in circles when our ideas are still jumbled.
data.answer_en_hint: I think we have gone round in circles when our ideas are still jumbled.

data.trans_hint: Ba mẹ quyết định ra bắc để thăm gia đình nhỏ của tôi một chuyến.
data.en_hint: My parents decided to go up for a visit to my own family.
data.content_game_1: My parents decided to go up for a visit to my own family.
data.answer_en_hint: My parents decided to go up for a visit to my own family.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy đã thăng tiến cao trong công ty nhờ vào chính năng lực của bạn thân.
data.en_hint: She has gone up very high in the company thanks to her own ability.
data.content_game_1: She has gone up very high in the company thanks to her own ability.
data.answer_en_hint: She has gone up very high in the company thanks to her own ability.

data.trans_hint: Căn nhà đã hoàn toàn cháy rụi sau vụ hỏa hoạn.
data.en_hint: The house completely went up in flames after the fire.
data.content_game_1: The house completely went up in flames after the fire.
data.answer_en_hint: The house completely went up in flames after the fire.
